# fornex_domain (Resource)

Provides a Fornex domain resource. This can be used to create and delete domains on Fornex DNS.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `ip` (String) Initial IP address for the domain.
- `name` (String) The domain name to manage.
